description: The Fedora Project’s Birds of a Feather brings together those who have an interest in Fedora, from the curious novice to the most hardcore user. The degree of ability is not as important as an interest in the Fedora Project. Attendees can find out about Fedora, discuss various aspects of the project, and network with Fedora users. This BoF is open to everyone.
title: Fedora Project Birds of a Feather
